alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 03 at 11:54PM EDT until October 04 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Southern Oxford, Southern Franklin, Southern Somerset, Central Interior Cumberland, Androscoggin and Interior Cumberland Highlands Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Grafton, Northern Carroll and Southern Carroll Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll
